item.description:
THE NEW STUFF:
The show starts at 7:50, so let's meet right inside the theater doors at 7:20. Then I'll buy our tickets and we can get snacks and head in.

If you're going to be late, need directions or have to change your RSVP after 5:00 p.m. tomorrow, give me a call (508/308-4897).

Hope to see you tomorrow!

--Dana

OLD STUFF:
I grew up on the book version of Where the Wild Things Are, as did so many others. Care to find out if Hollywood did it justice? Feel free to bring a kid or two along. Or any other guest. Just be sure to include them in your RSVP!

SUMMARY:
Max, a rambunctious and sensitive boy feels misunderstood at home and escapes to where the Wild Things are. He lands on an island where he meets mysterious and strange creatures whose emotions are as wild and unpredictable as their actions. The Wild Things desperately long for a leader to guide them, just as Max longs for a kingdom to rule. When Max is crowned king, he promises to create a place where everyone will be happy. Max soon finds, though, that ruling his kingdom is not so easy and his relationships there prove to be more complicated than he originally thought.

THE USUAL STUFF:
We'll meet outside the theater doors and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.00 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). Exact change makes me like you more.

As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

I'll update the time a few days before the meetup, so keep an eye on your email!

Hope to see you for Where the Wild Things Are!

--Dana
508/308-4897
item.name: Where the Wild Things Are
